pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ripemd======Given headache openssl devs gave to everyone, this is tiny ripemd module for python 3. Shamelessly ~~stolen~~ extracted from [pycryptodome](https://github.com/Legrandin/pycryptodome).### UsageSingle call:```pyfrom ripemd.ripemd160 import ripemd160 # import functionripemd160(b'abc').hex() == '8eb208f7e05d987a9b044a8e98c6b087f15a0bfc'ripemd160(b'a' * 1000000).hex() == '52783243c1697bdbe16d37f97f68f08325dc1528'```Update mode:```pyfrom ripemd import ripemd160 # import moduleh = ripemd160.new()h.update(b'abc')h.digest().hex() == '8eb208f7e05d987a9b044a8e98c6b087f15a0bfc'```
